original_text: When we were in Kedemoth desert, I sent a message to Sihon, king of Heshbon. We wanted to agree that we would not fight against each other.
korean_text: 내가 그데못 광야에서 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 사자를 보내어 평화의 말로 이르기를

sentences.original_text: When we were in Kedemoth desert
I sent a message to Sihon
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 헤스본 왕 시혼에게 메시지를 보냈습니다

sentences.original_text: that we would not fight against each other
